en.aboutContent: I am a passionate developer with experience in web development and a love for learning new technologies. And also for literature.
en.experienceContent: Worked as a junior developer at XYZ Company.
en.educationContent: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from ABC University.
en.skillsContent: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Bootstrap, Laravel.

es.aboutContent: Soy un desarrollador apasionado con experiencia en desarrollo web y a quien le encanta aprender nuevas tecnologías. Y la literatura.

ca.aboutContent: Sóc un desenvolupador apassionat amb experiència en desenvolupament web i a qui li encanta aprendre noves tecnologies. I la literatura.
